name: music_metadata
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_data.
Tool description: Social Media Data API in Real-Time.   -Get very useful and unique information.  -I'm on Telegram https://t.me/logicBuilder News and announcements Telegram Channel https://t.me/logicApi
API description: Get music metadata

Basic metadata: number of posts,  direct url to the song(MP3) and etc

music.description: The TikTok music URL. For example: 'https://www.tiktok.com/music/Streets-x-Kiss-it-better-7090403288818584347'.

fresh.description: By setting this query value to **1** you can force the API to return fresh data(not cached)
